page.title: 16MEDIA
page.content: AREA INFORMATION SOURCES The area has a monthly Village Newsletter a duplicated two sided newssheet, distributed free through the school,shops,pubs,garage and newspaper rounds.Financed by the Hope Village Hall,it gives reports on recent and forthcoming events and news of local residents.The Shropshire Star, an evening newspaper with a circulation of 93,000 covers the county and part of id Wales.Two weekly newspapers cover he area,published by the same group Shropshire Weekly Newspapers,these are the South Shropshire Journal and Shrewsbury Chronicle.The area lies on the border of the 2 papers circulation area.In May 1985, BBC launched Radio Shropshire which has proved very popular and gives good coverage of the area.
